title: Wear Gesture Launcher - Android Wear launcher
summary: Simply Launch your apps by draw a letter or shape on your watch!
description: Forget about swiping that long list of small icons; Just tap, draw, and done!Key features:*Tasker Integration,  Do everything you want with any gestures.*Launch Mobile Apps from your wear*Tap the edge of screen to open the launcher anytime on the watch*Easily create and perform any pattern you like to launch apps or make a phone call from watch*Preload all popular apps' gestures to get you started*Vibrate feedback*Launch your wearable apps without even looking at the screen! *Fully Standalone! Made for Android 2.0*Manage anything directly on your watch*iOS devices compatible Under developments:*Theater mode & Brightness booster support! Give back the shortcut that's missing since AW2.0*Quick volume/brightness control using gestures*Any more ideas? Just send an email to the developer! And keep in tune to get the newest versionA revolutionary way on your Android wear for launching apps or control anything, A quick wear launcher, gesture launcher, wear gestures, wear launcher, watch launcher, launcher for android wear.Hope you will enjoy the app, if there is any issues or suggestions, very welcome for suggestions and feedbacks from email!
descriptionHTML:
Forget about swiping that long list of small icons; Just tap, draw, and done!

Key features:
*Tasker Integration, Do everything you want with any gestures.
*Launch Mobile Apps from your wear
*Tap the edge of screen to open the launcher anytime on the watch
*Easily create and perform any pattern you like to launch apps or make a phone call from watch
*Preload all popular apps' gestures to get you started
*Vibrate feedback
*Launch your wearable apps without even looking at the screen!
*Fully Standalone! Made for Android 2.0
*Manage anything directly on your watch
*iOS devices compatible

Under developments:
*Theater mode & Brightness booster support! Give back the shortcut that's missing since AW2.0
*Quick volume/brightness control using gestures
*Any more ideas? Just send an email to the developer! And keep in tune to get the newest version

A revolutionary way on your Android wear for launching apps or control anything, A quick wear launcher, gesture launcher, wear gestures, wear launcher, watch launcher, launcher for android wear.

Hope you will enjoy the app, if there is any issues or suggestions, very welcome for suggestions and feedbacks from email!
comments: Wear Gesture Launcher lets you start an app with a simple tap-then-gesture combination.  It should work with almost any watch face.  It is faster than any other launcher I have used.  This launcher solves a fundamental problem with Wear launchers.  The user interface on a watch is just never going to be good at selecting one item from a large collection.  Wear Gesture Launcher eliminates the need to display everything you could choose by letting you create your own gestures for the apps you use regularly.  Wear Gesture Launcher works very well.  It's easy to set up, fast to use, and reliable.  It is not intended to replace the default launcher entirely, but it does eliminate the need to use it at least 90% of the time for me.
Well I have to say that this is one clever application and what a great idea. Seems to work very well indeed and I look forward to seeing new updates in the future..... excellent!!!
Useful tool. Will be 5 star when phone app shortcut launching and tasker integration is possible
5 stars for promised tasker intergration! Wooooo
Very nice addition to other launcher!
recentChanges: Added Tasker and mobile app support; Fixed bugs including bootup problem; More language support; steady connection and overall better experience.
